data.title: videoveracity.org
data.meta_description: The film follows three Big Chiefs of the New Orleans Mardi Gras Indian tradition as they prepare their costumes for Mardi Gras day. Throughout, encountering...
data.text:
Running on Cargo

Video Veracity is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization established in 1993 which supports the production and distribution of cultural, social-issue, and arts programming through documentary film, video, transmedia, and audio work by independent media producers in New Orleans and the surrounding region. The organization provides a link between media producers and foundations, individuals, distributors, other producers, and production facilities. Video Veracity also supports efforts to preserve archival independent film and video. Learn more about projects below, and please donate through PayPal, or send a check made payable to Video Veracity, Inc. to: 3020 Royal St., New Orleans, LA 70117. Donations are tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law.
